resources.string: Welcome to the CollabNet Subversion Edge Discovery Client!
It helps you find CollabNet Subversion Edge servers running on either the Standalone or Managed mode in the local network.

Before we get started, we need to get some legal information out of the way. The CollabNet SvnEdge Discovery API is an open-source library published under the GPLv3 license.\n\nThere is no official support from CollabNet, so use it at your own responsibility and WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY.
I found a CollabNet Subversion Edge server running
using the CollabNet Discovery - Android Client.
